      • getConfigurableProperties

        public List<ConfigurablePropertyWrapper> getConfigurableProperties()
        Returns a List of ConfigurablePropertyWrapper objects which correspond to the properties which can be configured for the current ConfigurableJobBeanWrapper. setConfigurableJobBeanWrapper(ConfigurableJobBeanWrapper) must be called first, or this method will return null.
        Returns:
        List of ConfigurablePropertyWrappers, or null.

      • getConfigurableJobResources

        public Map<String,String> getConfigurableJobResources()
        Returns the resource map which will provide labels for the ConfigurableJobBeanWrapper currently the focus of the job or trigger creation process. This is a read-only property which is set by setConfigurableJobBeanWrapper(ConfigurableJobBeanWrapper)
        Returns:

      • getSelectedJobRunning

        public int getSelectedJobRunning()
        This method runs the current job only once, right now
        Returns:
        int 0 if it's not running, 1 if it is, 2 if there is an error

      • processCreateTrigger

        public String processCreateTrigger()
        Creates a trigger for the currently selected JobDetailWrapper. This method redirects to UI to override configured properties if the Job is configurable.
        Returns:

      • processSetTriggerProperties

      • processPrepRunJobNow

        public String processPrepRunJobNow()
        Determines if the Job has configuration properties which might need to be overriden when the job is run. If so this redirects to a property configuration screen. Otherwise it simply continues to a confirmation screen.
        Returns:

      • processSetRunNowProperties

        public String processSetRunNowProperties()
        Processes the properties set for a Job that will be run now.
        Returns:

      • processRunJobNow

        public String processRunJobNow()
        This method runs the current job only once, right now. It will set properties on the Job execution if the Job has configurable properties.
        Returns:
        String
